p:
Samples of bulk soil, plant debris and shells along the cores were radiocarbon dated following standard procedures
56 . The 14C dates from seagrass cores were calibrated using the marine13 calibration curve
57 considering a local Delta R ranging from 3 to 71 years as a function of study site
58 . The corrected ages were used to produce an age-depth model (linear regression) to estimate sediment accumulation rates.
